meanings.definition: A medical instrument used for examining the cervix and vagina.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use colposcopes to look closely at the cervix.
meanings.sent2: The hospital purchased new colposcopes for the gynecology department.
meanings.sent3: During the check-up, the colposcopes made the cervix seem like a tiny world.
meanings.sent4: The colposcopes acted as detectives, uncovering hidden details of the cervix.
meanings.sent5: The bright light of the colposcopes illuminated the cervix, revealing its secrets.
